description: Template library for LoRA training dataset - single polygon outlines
author: Mr. Chuck
comments: Reusable templates for procedural polygon generation. All shapes are outline-only (no fill) for LoRA training. Copy and customize parameters in executables.

simple_outline_template.comments: Template for simple outlines with minimal complexity. Good starting point.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=${verts} bounds=${bounds} iterations=${iters} operations=split_offset

organic_outline_template.description: Organic polygon outline - flowing natural forms
organic_outline_template.comments: Template for organic shapes using sawtooth operations and inward bias. Creates smooth, flowing outlines.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=${verts} bounds=${bounds} iterations=${iters} operations=${ops} direction_bias=inward break_width_max=${break_width} projection_max=${projection} connect=${connect}

geometric_outline_template.description: Geometric polygon outline - angular precise forms
geometric_outline_template.comments: Template for geometric shapes using squarewave operations and outward bias. Creates sharp, angular outlines.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=${verts} bounds=${bounds} iterations=${iters} operations=squarewave direction_bias=outward break_width_max=${break_width} projection_max=${projection}

complex_outline_template.description: Complex polygon outline - multiple operations for variety
complex_outline_template.comments: Template for complex shapes using multiple operations. Creates intricate, detailed outlines.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=${verts} bounds=${bounds} iterations=${iters} operations=split_offset,sawtooth,squarewave direction_bias=random break_width_max=${break_width} projection_max=${projection}

random_outline_batch_template.description: Randomized polygon outline - for BATCH generation with RAND()
random_outline_batch_template.comments: Template specifically for BATCH operations. Uses RAND() for variation across iterations. All parameters randomized for maximum dataset diversity.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon shape VERTICES=RAND(5,10) BOUNDS=100,100,668,668 ITERATIONS=RAND(10,25) OPERATIONS=split_offset,sawtooth DIRECTION_BIAS=random DEPTH_RANGE=RAND(0.2,0.5),RAND(0.6,0.9)

centered_outline_template.description: Centered polygon outline - shape centered in canvas
centered_outline_template.comments: Template for centered shapes with equal margins. Good for consistent framing in dataset.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=${verts} bounds=184,184,584,584 iterations=${iters} operations=${ops} direction_bias=${bias}

preset_simple_template.comments: Template with simple configuration. Fast and reliable.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=5,8 bounds=${bounds} iterations=5 operations=split_offset

preset_organic_template.comments: Template with organic configuration. Creates flowing, natural shapes.
commands: PROC dynamic_polygon ${name} vertices=6,10 bounds=${bounds} iterations=15 operations=sawtooth direction_bias=inward

preset_complex_template.comments: Template with complex configuration. Creates detailed, intricate shapes.
